lore: Pedro Kantor is a superb combatant and an inspiring leader. The Chapter Master of the Crimson fists mows down enemy infantry with Dorn’s Arrow, blasting them apart with hails of mass-reactive bolts. Those who make the mistake ofgetting too close - whether battle tank or foot soldier - he crushes with thunderous blowsfrom the Fist of Retribution.

otherAbilities.name: Oath of Rynn:
otherAbilities.description: Once per battle, at the start of either player’s Command phase , this model can use this ability. When it does, until the end of the turn, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of weapons equipped by models in this model’s unit.

otherAbilities.name: To the Last:
otherAbilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll if that unit is below its Starting Strength , and add 1 to the Wound roll as well if that unit is Below Half-strength .
